info.name: VisualStudio.com-Gray
info.description: A semi-dark theme for Visual Studio Team Services (visualstudio.com). If you find any issues please send me a PM.
info.additionalInfo: 2018/06/26 - version 0.1 - The CSS is very messy right now. It will be cleaned up in future versions. Just started making this because I wasn't a fan of the other themes and several haven't been updated in years.
